Package bauernhof.preset.networking

Class C2SConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • bauernhof.preset.networking.C2SConnection
  • public abstract class C2SConnection
extends Object
    A connection from a Client to a Server.
    The following functions get automatically called when the Server calls their equivalent functions on RemotePlayer:
    • onGetName()
    • onInit(GameConfiguration, ImmutableList, ImmutableList, int)
    • onRequest()
    • onUpdate(Move)
    • onGetScore()
    • onVerifyGame(ImmutableList)
    See Also:
    S2CConnection

      Construct a new C2SConnection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • C2SConnection

        public C2SConnection​(Socket connection,
                     GameConfigurationParser gameConfigurationParser,
                     String projectName)
              throws IOException
        Construct a new C2SConnection.

        You need to call handlePackets() to start handling the incomming packets from the server.

        Parameters:
        connection - The connection that will be used for communicating with the server.
        gameConfigurationParser - For parsing the received GameConfiguration.
        projectName - The name of this project/group.
        Throws:
        IOException - A networking error occured.

    • Method Detail

      • handlePackets

        public final void handlePackets()
                         throws IOException,
                                RemoteException
        Handles all incoming requests from the server.

        This function is blocking until either an error was thrown or the game has ended.
        The connection is automatically closed if an exception was thrown.

        Throws:
        IOException - A networking error occured.
        RemoteException - An error occured on the server or on a different client.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Is the connection still open?
        Returns:
        true if the connection is still open.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Closes the connection.

        This function does nothing if the connection is already closed.

      • shouldKeepAlive

        public boolean shouldKeepAlive()
        Whether the server asks of you to keep the connection open and reuse for another game after the game has ended.

        This function is only relevant for OptionalFeature.TOURNAMENTS.

        Returns:
        true if the server still asks for the connection to be kept alive.
        See Also:
        S2CConnection.setKeepAlive(boolean)
